ai-mil7.2.4:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, when there was a grossness, all the barber, the for which the Sangha did.”
ai-mil7.2.4:1.2_0: “Great king, if you proclaim a lamp on what can you take birth again and again, then you don’t go again.
ai-mil7.2.4:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, one who I will conceive the womb for rebirth in a future life, or in the future after going to the destruction of cankers and runnning all identifying, ‘I’ll breathe in the future.’
ai-mil7.2.4:1.4_0: this is the practice of leopard.
ai-mil7.2.4:1.5_0: The Buddha has spoken about what you have said.
ai-mil7.2.4:2.1_0: ‘Among the people who cut off the bonds,
ai-mil7.2.4:2.4_0: so rain, sky, if you wish.’”
ai-mil7.2.4:3.1_0: The fourth enquiry is the fourth (from the lion).
